00020 #ifndef __TLM_FIFO_H__
00021 #define __TLM_FIFO_H__
00022 
00023 //
00024 // This implements put, get and peek
00025 //
00026 // It also implements 0 and infinite size fifos - but the size
00027 // zero fifos aren't rendezvous like zero length fifos, they simply are both
00028 // full and empty at the same time.
00029 //
00030 // The size can be dynamically changed using the resize interface
00031 //
00032 // To get an infinite fifo use a -ve size in the constructor.
00033 // The absolute value of the size is taken as the starting size of the
00034 // actual physical buffer.
00035 //
00036 
00037 //#include <systemc>
00038 
00039 #include "tlm_core/tlm_1/tlm_req_rsp/tlm_1_interfaces/tlm_fifo_ifs.h"
00040 #include "tlm_core/tlm_1/tlm_req_rsp/tlm_channels/tlm_fifo/circular_buffer.h"
00041 
00042 namespace tlm {
00043 
00044 template <typename T>
00045 class tlm_fifo :
00046   public virtual tlm_fifo_get_if<T>,
00047   public virtual tlm_fifo_put_if<T>,
00048   public sc_core::sc_prim_channel
00049 {
00050 public:
00051 
00052     // constructors
00053 
00054     explicit tlm_fifo( int size_ = 1 )
00055       : sc_core::sc_prim_channel( sc_core::sc_gen_unique_name( "fifo" ) ) {
00056 
00057       init( size_ );
00058 
00059     }
00060 
00061     explicit tlm_fifo( const char* name_, int size_ = 1 )
00062       : sc_core::sc_prim_channel( name_ ) {
00063 
00064       init( size_ );
00065 
00066     }
00067 
00068     // destructor
00069 
00070     virtual ~tlm_fifo() {}
00071 
00072     // tlm get interface
00073 
00074     T get( tlm_tag<T> * = 0 );
00075 
00076     bool nb_get( T& );
00077     bool nb_can_get( tlm_tag<T> * = 0 ) const;
00078     const sc_core::sc_event &ok_to_get( tlm_tag<T> * = 0 ) const {
00079       return m_data_written_event;
00080     }
00081 
00082     // tlm peek interface
00083 
00084     T peek( tlm_tag<T> * = 0 ) const;
00085 
00086     bool nb_peek( T& ) const;
00087     bool nb_can_peek( tlm_tag<T> * = 0 ) const;
00088     const sc_core::sc_event &ok_to_peek( tlm_tag<T> * = 0 ) const {
00089       return m_data_written_event;
00090     }
00091 
00092     // tlm put interface
00093 
00094     void put( const T& );
00095 
00096     bool nb_put( const T& );
00097     bool nb_can_put( tlm_tag<T> * = 0 ) const;
00098 
00099     const sc_core::sc_event& ok_to_put( tlm_tag<T> * = 0 ) const {
00100       return m_data_read_event;
00101     }
00102 
00103     // resize if
00104 
00105     void nb_expand( unsigned int n = 1 );
00106     void nb_unbound( unsigned int n = 16 );
00107 
00108     bool nb_reduce( unsigned int n = 1 );
00109     bool nb_bound( unsigned int n );
00110 
00111     // debug interface
00112 
00113     bool nb_peek( T & , int n ) const;
00114     bool nb_poke( const T & , int n = 0 );
00115 
00116     int used() const {
00117       return m_num_readable - m_num_read;
00118     }
00119 
00120     int size() const {
00121       return m_size;
00122     }
00123 
00124     void debug() const {
00125 
00126       if( is_empty() ) std::cout << "empty" << std::endl;
00127       if( is_full() ) std::cout << "full" << std::endl;
00128 
00129       std::cout << "size " << size() << " - " << used() << " used "
00130                 << std::endl;
00131       std::cout << "readable " << m_num_readable
00132                 << std::endl;
00133       std::cout << "written/read " << m_num_written << "/" << m_num_read
00134                 << std::endl;
00135 
00136     }
00137 
00138     // support functions
00139 
00140     static const char* const kind_string;
00141 
00142     const char* kind() const
00143         { return kind_string; }
00144 
00145 
00146 protected:
00147     sc_core::sc_event &read_event( tlm_tag<T> * = 0 ) {
00148       return m_data_read_event;
00149     }
00150 
00151 protected:
00152 
00153     void update();
00154 
00155     // support methods
00156 
00157     void init( int );
00158 
00159 protected:
00160 
00161     circular_buffer<T> buffer;
00162 
00163     int m_size;                  // logical size of fifo
00164 
00165     int m_num_readable;          // #samples readable
00166     int m_num_read;          // #samples read during this delta cycle
00167     int m_num_written;           // #samples written during this delta cycle
00168     bool m_expand;               // has an expand occurred during this delta cycle ?
00169     int m_num_read_no_notify;    // #samples read without notify during this delta cycle
00170 
00171     sc_core::sc_event m_data_read_event;
00172     sc_core::sc_event m_data_written_event;
00173 
00174 private:
00175 
00176     // disabled
00177     tlm_fifo( const tlm_fifo<T>& );
00178     tlm_fifo& operator = ( const tlm_fifo<T>& );
00179 
00180     //
00181     // use nb_can_get() and nb_can_put() rather than the following two
00182     // private functions
00183     //
00184 
00185     bool is_empty() const {
00186       return used() == 0;
00187     }
00188 
00189     bool is_full() const {
00190       //return size() == m_num_readable + m_num_written; // Old buggy code
00191       if( size() < 0 )
00192         return false;
00193       else
00194         return size() <= m_num_readable + m_num_written;
00195     }
00196 
00197 };
00198 
00199 template <typename T>
00200 const char* const tlm_fifo<T>::kind_string = "tlm_fifo";
00201 
00202 
00203 /******************************************************************
00204 //
00205 // init and update
00206 //
00207 ******************************************************************/
00208 
00209 template< typename T >
00210 inline
00211 void
00212 tlm_fifo<T>::init( int size_ ) {
00213 
00214   if( size_ > 0 ) {
00215     buffer.resize( size_ );
00216   }
00217 
00218   else if( size_ < 0 ) {
00219     buffer.resize( -size_ );
00220   }
00221 
00222   else {
00223     buffer.resize( 16 );
00224   }
00225 
00226   m_size = size_;
00227   m_num_readable = 0;
00228   m_num_read = 0;
00229   m_num_written = 0;
00230   m_expand = false;
00231   m_num_read_no_notify = false;
00232 
00233 }
00234 
00235 template < typename T>
00236 inline
00237 void
00238 tlm_fifo<T>::update()
00239 {
00240     if( m_num_read > m_num_read_no_notify || m_expand ) {
00241   m_data_read_event.notify( sc_core::SC_ZERO_TIME );
00242     }
00243 
00244     if( m_num_written > 0 ) {
00245   m_data_written_event.notify( sc_core::SC_ZERO_TIME );
00246     }
00247 
00248     m_expand = false;
00249     m_num_read = 0;
00250     m_num_written = 0;
00251     m_num_readable = buffer.used();
00252     m_num_read_no_notify = 0;
00253 
00254 }
00255 
00256 } // namespace tlm

00260 #include "tlm_core/tlm_1/tlm_req_rsp/tlm_channels/tlm_fifo/tlm_fifo_resize.h"
00261 
00262 #endif
